newsitem.title: GREECE: MAILLIS PUBLIC OFFERING OVERSUBSCRIBED - TELESIS.
newsitem.headline: MAILLIS PUBLIC OFFERING OVERSUBSCRIBED - TELESIS.

text.p: A 1.89 billion drachma public offering by small cap Maillis was oversubscribed 6.24 times issue advisor Telesis Capital said in a statement.

Maillis, a maker of specialised steel straps used in industrial packaging issued 900,000 shares at 2,100 drachmas and will transfer to the bourse's main market following the completion of its public offering.

"Proceeds will finance a five-year 5.0 billion drachma investment programme which is also funded by the national economy ministry. It will expand production capacity and upgrade equipment for the introduction of new products," Telesis said.
In total, 73 institutional investors showed interest in the public offering and this portion of the public offering was oversubscribed 12.34 times.

Underwriters for the issue included Telesis Securities, Commercial Bank , Midland, Omega Securities, Schroders, Dorian Bank, Xiosbank and Eurobank. --George Georgiopoulos, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
